mapper.insert: insert into feed (user_idx, stock, title, content, create_at) values (#{userIdx}, #{stock}, #{title}, #{content}, now())
mapper.update: update feed set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, update_at = now(), stock = #{stock} where user_idx = #{userIdx} and board_idx = #{boardIdx}
mapper.delete: delete from feed where user_idx = #{userIdx} and board_idx = #{boardIdx}
